note.p: Italian zoologist. Professor of zoology and comparative anatomy, University of Modena, 1871–83. Fellow of the Società dei Naturalisti in Modena, 1872; vice-president, 1875. Taught at the University of Rome from 1883. Founded the Società Romana per gli Studi Zoologici (later the Società Zoologica Italiana) in 1892.
